text: guys today I'm gonna make a completely
no bake cheesecake that's right I said
completely no bake and that's what its
gonna be in this bowl I have ground up
20 graham crackers to that add two
tablespoons of sugar and 11 tablespoons
exactly 11 tablespoons of unsalted
melted butter mix them together that's
your crust now normally you would make a
crust like this and then you would bake
it a little bit but for this recipe you
really don't have to
and in fact I'm pretty sure for any
refrigerated pie recipe you don't have
to because the butter just solidifies
and it makes it into a crust all you
need to do is get all of your crumbs
nicely moistened with the butter and
then pour it into a 9-inch springform
pan it needs to be springform so it's
easy to remove and you go crumbs and
then spread them in the bottom and about
1-inch up the sides of the pan make a
nice firm crust it should be one and a
half to two inches up the side which is
why I had such a thick crust on the
bottom now this just needs to chill for
about 10 minutes and you can do that
while you make the filling for the

ounces each I recommend something like

cream cheeses do not work as well
one can fourteen and a half ounces of
